title: Your account can be suspended, deleted or censored for any reason

tosdr.tldr: "Without advance notice and at any time, we may, for violations of this agreement or for any other reason we choose: (1) suspend your access to reddit, (2) suspend or terminate Your Account or reddit gold membership, and/or (3) remove any of your User Content from reddit." They can remove any of your content and suspend or delete your account for any reason.
